tool_description: Generates optimal measurement points across the instrument range for comprehensive calibration coverage based on statistical requirements and standards.

standard_compliance.description: Calibration standard to follow (ISO_10012, ASME_B89, DIN_2257)

error_messages: Invalid range: range_min must be less than range_max and both must be positive.
Insufficient points: minimum_points must be at least 3 for valid calibration.
Unknown distribution method: Use one of [linear, logarithmic, custom, standard_decade].
Standard not supported: Use one of [ISO_10012, ASME_B89, DIN_2257].
Range too small: Measurement range insufficient for meaningful point distribution.
usage: Define measurement range and distribution preferences. Tool generates statistically appropriate calibration points according to specified standards and requirements.

calibration_points.description: Generated calibration point values in millimeters

point_count.description: Total number of calibration points generated
